column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailshare on printmore sharing services print & condolences offer condolence for the family of betty white posted by winkel funeral home on june 20, 2015 1 comment on betty white. messages of condolence. debbie guina says: always so hard to say goodby to our loved ones. at least we have the comfort of knowing that your mom is so happy and has perfect peace, as she is with the lord, and reunited with her mom and siblings. many fond memories of time spent with aunt betty! she had a fun sense oh humor! so glad that i had the chance to take her and my mother to lunch a couple years ago! love and prayers for all of you! debbie. please share your thoughts ... name email address please leave your message of condolence below how do i send condolences? at the bottom of this page, you will find a condolence form. you will need to fill out some basic information prior to typing your message. (we will not share your e-mail address with anyone) once you are finished, simply click the submit condolence button. within 24 hours the condolence will be approved before it is published to the web site. we also provide a tell-a-friend feature located directly below these instructions. this form allows you to send the obituary to a friend. this is particularly helpful to someone who may live out of town. share this your name* your email* their name* their email* message
